channel.title: neXus 9 released!
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://www.rscheata.net/tp/Smileys/default/cheers.gif[/img][size=16pt][b]neXus 9[/b][/size][img]http://www.rscheata.net/tp/Smileys/default/cheers.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.rscheata.net/tp/Themes/BlackRain11fin/images/brlogo.gif[/img]
[url=http://www.rscheata.net/nexusteaser/RSCAneXusv8teaser.avi][b][size=14pt]neXus 9 Teaser (Video Preview)[/size][/b][/url] WARNING: may cause you to get back into runescape.
neXus is the NEW style of RuneScape autoing... A picture says a thousand words, but in this case there is a thousand words in a picture [img]http://www.rscheata.net/tp/Smileys/default/stirthepot.gif[/img] http://rscheata.net/images/impsoft.nexus.bots.color.methods.png
[b]DOWNLOAD: http://www.rscheata.net/tp/index.php?page=27[/b]
[u][b]Advanced Map walking[/b][/u] [img]http://www.rscheata.net/images/mm.JPG[/img]
[b]Scripting has gotten a whole lot EASIER[/b] Utilizing very efficent and fast easy script functions nearly anyone can make a iBot script.
[img]http://rscheata.net/images/rgbCluster.JPG[/img] RGBCluster!!!
[ul][li][u]track objects[/u] as they move thru the updatePoints(). [/li][li]sort based on [u]distance to player[/u][/li][li]points near each other can be removed[/li][li][u]remove possible bad points[/u] based on if a color is near them[/li][/ul] - hp bars - gas on rock
[ul][li]poll each moving object for toptext and/or menu action[/li][/ul] - [u]while moving the mouse to a point, every object locations is tracked/updated[/u] if they move the order is modified.
[u]Autofighting made easy!!! Anti-Gas made easy!!![/u]
For example: Aryan tutisland 923 lines ARGA tutisland 828 lines SRL/SCAR tutisland 2498 lines [u]iBot uberTutIslandV6 751 lines[/u]
Aryan Regex's Rimmington 271 lines ARGA RimmingtonAnyMiner 438 lines SRL/SCAR Rimmington Member Script 991 lines [u]iBot IMPRimmington 225 lines[/u]
[b]NEW Most Advanced INPUT system![/b] Each input thread for each bot will maintain a queue for each thread that gives it input. Human mouse clicks will be routed thru the system so no more block human. Scripts and randoms know exactly when their order is complete no more guessing timings. Overriding orders are better, so a mouse can follow a npc easily. anti-ban features like clicking off the applet while playing [img]http://rscheata.net/images/neXus9.PNG[/img]
Need Help? please view this first: http://www.rscheata.net/tp/index.php?page=28
[/center]
Traceback: http://www.rscheata.net/tp/index.php/topic,2747

item.title: neXus 9 released!
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

bobby:

is it free?

The tutorial island script is for the pro version of ibot and you need to be a contributer or supporter on rscheta to get it.

Read full topic

N ya, i agree with you Monster :).

item.title: neXus 9 released!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

To GenoDemoN, and to ruler too,
You have gained my respect once again. I’m still not fond of ARGA implementation, but you are moving away from it and making your bot better and not needing ARGA.
You have most of the features of ARGA. I’m amazed.
That mapwalking and colour finding system you are now using is incredible too!
Good job.

-Mh

Read full topic

item.title: neXus 9 released!
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

I have learned alot about java working on ibot with eric it was worth time.

Read full topic

item.title: neXus 9 released!
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

[quote=“Rictoo, post:31, topic:64902”]Wow, nice job guys! I can tell you guys put a TON of work into it. I really congratulate you. But I still must add that this is such a waste of time (making iBot) compared to other things in life. How many hours and hours and hours of work have you put into this? Around 1000? Think what you could do with that time…

Then again… maybe you don’t have any other way to spend your time -.-’[/quote][quote=“Rictoo, post:34, topic:64902”][quote author=k00dr link=topic=94178.msg982858#msg982858 date=1173312517]
Rictoo, what the HELL is that supposed to mean?
I assume you mean he should be out socializing? :rolleyes:

Congratulations on the bot, it looks fantastic on the outside.
[/quote]

No, I mean he wasted many hours on a program that won’t even exist in 3 years.[/quote]

Maybe he is practicing with java. I know back in the day, I wasted alot of time make stuff just to get better at coding that particular language. In fact I got the exact same spades program I wrote in assembly, c++ and java that other than playing it to test for bugs and such I never even played. If I started to learn another language, I would make the same exact program again in it too. Once I was happy with it, it would go bye bye.

I have done alot of junk and never looked back at it or used it.

Read full topic

Then again… maybe you don’t have any other way to spend your time -.-’
